attributes.title: If I could give it 0 stars I would
attributes.review: It took 2 days to download and then when it did, it crashed right away! I tried for about 4 days to get it up and running, and when it did you could not believe what I saw!! Awful awful awful! So much child porn!!! I’ve never been more ashamed

attributes.title: Terrible coding
attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app to work but clearly something went wrong after using the app for about 30 minutes it would crash and exit out. I’ve tried re downloading it but it got even worse with each download. Now I can’t even open it.

attributes.title: In danger
attributes.review: I love the big orange (obviously he’s my dad)! He wanted my whole family to support his app so it would do better so I the app would do better. I refused to download the app because I’m 14 and I live with him so there is no point in my downloading it. The app took up the rest of my phones storage and now I can’t download Tok Tok. - your son Barron 🥰✨🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: Took way too long
attributes.review: This app took forever to download and I want to see it to support America and everything and when the app decided to finally finish downloading it constantly kept glitching and I couldn’t even do anything on it anyway so all that waiting was for nothing horrible app!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: So I got the app and they asked me to sign in and I’m like no and then they spam me with viruses and I’m just like that’s crazy and then they said make America great again and I’m like it was never great, and it was like keep America great and I’m like what is his definition of great 💀💀😭, but yeah I had to get a new phone because so many viruses and worst president ever, and worst app DELETE THIS APP PLEASE APP STORE!!.

attributes.title: worst app EVER!🤮
attributes.review:
the app made my phone glitch like crazy!! (Almost  as crazy as the president is) It is so slow with loading any pages. It also has no useful information shared on the app (also like how the president doesn’t share any useful information to the country) 
I wish I could give it zero stars. TRASH!!!!!

attributes.userName: no way i’m using my real name
attributes.title: DISGUSTANG
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took YEARS to download. When it finally finished, I had already reached my 80th birthday. My children were dead. My Wife was dead. I knew that I would for sure not sign up. I have a feeling that if I signed up a orange creature would just pop up into my house screaming and chanting ‘orange lives matter.’ One star.

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: thought about eating glass after i opened this app. if you vote for donald trump, you’re a white supremacist✨to see mr. president on the opening page with his fat orange figure and ignorant, racist, sexist, misogynistic, homophobic ideals ALMOST gave me a stroke. terrible app, would rather eat the “meat” at arby’s than vote for this trashbag🧚🏻🥰✨🌈 sweetie, you cant keep america great if it was never great to begin with. stop lying❤️

attributes.title: NeVeR AgAiN
attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app and support our Orange of a president but it took an good week to fully download and once it finally downloaded it was such a slow process to completely sign in. needless to say this app made my phone glitch out and changed my home and lock screen to trump 🍊🍤. so I DO NOT RECOMMEND.

attributes.title: Do not get !!!!!
attributes.review: It took two weeks to download and then when it started it started playing music which bought a whole bunch of cockroaches and I’m scared of bugs and that lovely peaches came and broke into my house so now I have spiders and STDs I will never get this app again I would give it a zero star if I could
